src.Fault.Fault module¶

Fault Class

class src.Fault.Fault.Fault(name: str, dh_f: float, in_fault: dict)[source]¶

Bases: object

plot_fault_inputs()[source]¶
src.Fault.Fault.load_mat_file(infile)[source]¶

Load matlab structure file :param infile:

infile: string = matlab structure’s name

: return:

in_fault: dict = input coords, slip, rupture time, rise time of the file

src.Fault.GenerateFault module¶

Fault Generator Params:

dh_f: float = Size of output square subfaults .mat = Structure matlab file name: string = Name of structure matlab file

Return:

Fault object with slip, rupture time, and rise time distributions over the interpolated fault
